headline: 2025-10-29 — The European Broadcasting Union (EBU) published research finding leading AI assistants misrepresent news content in nearly 50% of their responses (≈50% of responses).
2025-10-28 — Microsoft will retain a stake valued at about $135 billion, representing roughly 27% ownership, in OpenAI Group PBC as control moves to the OpenAI Foundation.
2025-10-27 — Reuters (Thomson Reuters' news division) states it reaches 'billions of people worldwide every day,' indicating a daily audience measured in billions of people (billions/day).
2025-10-30 — Bloomberg published its UK startups list for a second consecutive year (2nd annual list) and reported that venture capital investments, which stagnated in 2023, have returned to growth.
2025-10-26 — Waymo remains 'the one to beat' in autonomous vehicles, effectively retaining a #1 competitive position in the sector (rank = 1).
